descriptionSet.description: A poster showing portraits of 16 presidents of the Indian National Congress between 1895 to 1905. It was published by Hemchunder Hiralal Bhargava, agent for Ravi Varma Pictures.

inscription.text: Presidents of the Indian National Congress 1885-1905
Agents for Ravi-Varma Pictures, Chandnichowk (near Dariba) Delhi.
Wholesale Stationers, Swadeshi Picture, Picture-Frames & Glass Merchants.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.

hra:item.hra:value: text-en: Presidents of the Indian National Congress 1885-1905

text-en Sir Pherozeshah M. Mehta (Calcutta 1890) Romesh Chandra Dutt, C.I.E. (Lucknow 1899) (Bombay 1885) W. C. Bonnerji Esq (Allahabad 1892) Almohan Ghose Esq. (Madras 1903) Dinshah Edalji Watcha Esq. (Calcutta 1901)
(Poona 1895) Surendra Nath Bannerji, Esq. (Ahmadabad 1902) Sir Henry Cotton, K.C.I.E. (Bombay 1904) (Calcutta 1886) Dadabhoy Naoroji, Esq. (Lahore 1899) Sir William Wedderburn, Bart. (Bombay 1889) Rahitmulla M. Sayani, Esq. (Calcutta 1896)
Hon. Justice N. C. Chandawarkar, Esq. (Lahore 1900) Alfred Webb, Esq. (Madras 1894) Hon. Justice Budrudin Tyabji, Esq. (Madras 1887) George Yule, Esq. (Allahabad 1888) Hon. C. Sankaren Nair, Esq. (Amraoti 1987)
Raj Bahadut P. Ananda Carlu C.I.E. (Nagpore 1891) Hon. G. K. Gokhale, Esq. (Benares 1905) Anand Mohan Boze, Esq. (Madras 1896)
text-en: Published by Hemchunder Hiralal Bharghava
text-en: Agents for Ravi-Varma Pictures, Chandnichowk (near Dariba) Delhi.
text-en: Wholesale Stationers, Swadeshi Picture, Picture-Frames & Glass Merchants.
description-en: A poster showing portraits of 16 presidents of the Indian National Congress between 1895 to 1905. It was published by Hemchunder Hiralal Bhargava, agent for Ravi Varma Pictures.
